channel.title: Paintball
channel.description: I went paint balling today, and realized how much my gun sucks. I wanna get a new one, but until the summer my funds will be quite low..( like $20 a week..50 at most.) I want to get a new gun, but im not sure which brand/attachments i want. I know for sure i want a double trigger..and i don't want a tipman. So suggest away please.

item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:

Fluid Paintballs by JT Sports

Hydro $60 $33 $22

A case is 2000.

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:4, topic:258323”]Get a Spyder Electra w/ Rocking Trigger. I have one and it’s amazinggg :D.[/quote]Do that if you’re gay.

The Impulse was hot when I got it. I put 1800$ worth of shit on it. It was ballin’.

Evil Omen is a good, cheap gun. Try that out.

when i could go buy 2000 for $25 at a local store..
They probably suck though. Evil paint is good.

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

I wana get an impulse…but i don’t wana waste $400 on a gun thatll be used once or twice a month. But me and some friends were thinkin of building a course up in his mountain house…so i might actually do it ( could go whenever we wanted too…also alot cheaper because we wouldn’t have to buy the owners paint and we could bring our own) . But with an electric gun you also have to pay for n2 tanks…and none of the places around here fill em.

Also: Is it a rule in most places that you have to buy their paint…All the courses around here make you, and they charge like $20 for 500 paintballs, when i could go buy 2000 for $25 at a local store…

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @Scrubs Scrubs
item.description:
@Scrubs wrote:

I got a Spyder Xtra, haven’t played in months. I’d sell it for 100 bucks, all gear included + 3k balls I’m never going to use (had 10k)

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

Should i just get one used of ebay or something? It would be alot cheaper…But im not sure if i want a used one.

[quote=“io9, post:5, topic:258323”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=341109.msg2640727#msg2640727 date=1232847726]
Get a Spyder Electra w/ Rocking Trigger. I have one and it’s amazinggg :D.
[/quote]
It’s dicks, I had one, and it sucked shit on toast.

However, the most epic combo I ever found, was Spyder Pilot ACS with a Brass Eagle barrel. Shoots straighter than your father is, and faster than you in bed.[/quote] My neighbor has the Pilot ACS. That thing is boss.

Read full topic

I wanna sell my electra lol. Anyone interested? I don’t play anymore =/

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I have a spyder e99 and I love it. Much better then tipman pieces of shit. Some of my friends have way better guns, but this one is quite nice for someone who doesn’t paintball all that often. Never had a problem with it and it shoots great. It was only like 200 dollars a long time ago, probably cheaper now.

Read full topic

Get a Spyder Electra w/ Rocking Trigger. I have one and it’s amazinggg :D.

It’s dicks, I had one, and it sucked shit on toast.

However, the most epic combo I ever found, was Spyder Pilot ACS with a Brass Eagle barrel. Shoots straighter than your father is, and faster than you in bed.
